message: Dear Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which is tailored to meet your specific needs and valued at $10000. Considering its high quality and unique features, I believe it would be an excellent addition to your collection. I am extending this exclusive offer to you at the same value, $10000, to ensure you have the opportunity to own it without any additional cost. Please let me know if you're interested in proceeding with this offer.
